node.name: FAB Defense T-POD G2 Tactical Bipod
node.short_description: FAB’s new T-POD-G2 is a rotating tactical fore-grip & bipod that transforms the fore-grip into a fully functional bipod at the push of a button.
node.description:
FAB's new T-POD-G2 is a rotating tactical fore-grip & bipod that transforms the fore-grip into a fully functional bipod at the push of a button.

 

 

T-POD G2 Tactical Bipod Features

Transforms from a fore-grip into a fully functioning bipod at the push of a button
Head features a unique rotating and tilting mechanism
Built in adjustable pressure switch mount
Quick release picatinny mount
Independent adjustable legs with 5 different length options
Legs are made from 6061-t6 hard coated anodised aluminium
Durable and lightweight fibreglass reinforced polymer construction
User installable - no gunsmith required

 

T-POD G2 Tactical Bipod Compatibility:

All firearms with an underside 1913 MIL-STD picatinny rail.
Requires a minimum of 6 slots / 6.5 cm rail.

node.name: FAB Defense T-Pod G2 QR Tactical Bipod
node.short_description: The T-POD G2 QR is a State-of-the-Art fore-grip that swiftly transforms into a fully functional Bipod at the push of a button.
node.description:
The T-POD G2 QR is a State-of-the-Art fore-grip that swiftly transforms into a fully functional Bipod at the push of a button.

 

T-Pod G2 QR Tactical Bipod Features

Wide angle leg opening offers stability and enhanced combat positioning
The only fully functional bipod for precision shooting built into a vertical fore-grip
Built for quick transition from close range engagement to longer range precision targets
An ergonomic fore-grip transforms into a sturdy bipod with the push of a button
Leg height is adjustable/each leg independently adjustable for uneven terrain
Bipod allows slight pivot to adjust cant
Secured with dual quick-release wing-nuts
Aviation-grade aluminium, steel, and reinforced polymer composite

node.name: FAB Defense Tactical Folding Grip
node.short_description: The T-FL 7 Positions Vertically Folding Tactical Foregrip quickly transforms from a horizontal grip into a vertical grip at the push of a button and provides enhanced versatility, grip and functionality.
node.description:
The T-FL 7 Positions Vertically Folding Tactical Foregrip quickly transforms from a horizontal grip into a vertical grip at the push of a button and provides enhanced versatility, grip and functionality.

 

FAB Defense Tactical Folding Grip Advantages:

Easy to fit and secure – slides on the rail and secured with two bolts
Compact foregrip folds to any of seven angles
Enhances natural fighting stance and hold on your rifle
Incorporates a convenient waterproof storage compartment
Improved reaction, on-target time, and muzzle control during close combat
MIL-SPEC fiberglass reinforced polymer composite

 

Tactical Folding Grip Compatibility:

All 1913 Picatinny or weaver rails (Min' 60mm long)

node.name: FAB Defense Universal Scope Mount
node.short_description: The USM, FAB Defense Universal Scope Mount, is a Universal Handgun Scope Mount which requires no modification to the gun and offers a steady and secure mounting platform over the slide.
node.description:
The USM, FAB Defense Universal Scope Mount, is a Universal Handgun Scope Mount which requires no modification to the gun and offers a steady and secure mounting platform over the slide.

 

FAB Defense Universal Scope Mount Advantages:

Extremely durable - Milled from 6061 T6 billet aluminum
Matt black hard coat anodized for optimal wear resistance
Original sights remain operational
Quick and easy single-bolt installation, no modification or Gunsmith required
Facilitates prompt sight alignment
Compatible with 1913 MIL-STD picatinny rail based optics
Adds a front underside accessory rail in place of the original in use

 

FAB Defense Universal Scope Mount Compatibility:

All handguns with underside accessory rail & standard hight sights that are in compliance with the following specifications:

A minimum of 45 mm long Picatinny or weaver accessory rail.
Up to 28 mm in slide and body width.
Up to 48 mm in Height from under side of accessory rail to end of front sight.

node.name: FAB Defense Versatile Tactical Support
node.short_description: The VTS Versatile Tactical Support from FAB Defense provides a large variety of solutions for forward grip positioning, enhancing comfort and increasing accuracy.
node.description:
The FAB Defense Versatile Tactical Support provides a large variety of solutions for forward grip positioning, enhancing comfort and increasing accuracy.

This ergonomic support can be set in multiple locations for a wide variety of tactical needs and ideal operational superiority, taking in mind ideal compact configuration.

 

FAB Defense Versatile Tactical Support Advantages:

Allows Optimal Personal Configuration of Your Rifle
Fits on All 1913 Picatinny Rails
Improves Weapon Control and Ergonomics
Permits Safe and Efficient use in Extreme Operational Scenarios
Can be used Complimentary to the PTK as a Thumb Support

 

Versatile Tactical Support Compatibility:

Fits on All 1913 MIL-STD Picatinny rails

node.name: Form Pistol Grip for Chiappa Rhino LH -Black Laminte
node.short_description: Customise your Chiappa Pistol with these target grips from Form Rifle stocks.
node.description:
You can now customise your Chiappa Chiappa Rhino with target pistol grips from Form Rifle stocks. This is LH variant.

Chiappa Rhino Pistol Grip Features:

Highly ergonomic target grip
Available in right-hand and left-hand versions
Outstanding oil finish
CNC machined for a perfect fit
Supplied with fitting spanner for the UK spec LBR

node.name: Tippmann Arms 12" Aluminium Handguard
node.short_description: The Tippmann Arms 12″ handguard is a great upgrade to your M4-22. The M-LOK design allows mounting of bipods, grips, lights, lasers and optics.
node.description:
The Tippmann Arms 12" handguard is a great upgrade to your M4-22. The M-LOK design allows mounting of bipods, grips, lights, lasers and optics.

Free float handguards are known to improve accuracy. The accuracy of the free-floating handguard comes from the fact that the handguard doesn’t touch the barrel – it is mounted directly to the upper receiver. This allows the barrel to “float” and gives better harmonics, resulting in slightly increased accuracy.

Accuracy difference is especially evident when using grips or bipods. When you rest a rifle on a bipod that is attached to the barrel, or a drop-in handguard, the bipod will create force that can slightly warp the barrel. This small amount of warping can provide fairly significant accuracy issues on the range. But with a free-float handguard, you can put all kinds of force on the handguard and it won't affect the barrel whatsoever.

node.name: Tippmann Arms 9" M-LOK Handguard
node.short_description: This Tippmann Arms 9″ M-LOK handguard is a great upgrade to your M4-22. The M-LOK design allows mounting of bipods, grips, lights, lasers and optics.
node.description:
This Tippmann Arms 9" M-LOK handguard is a great upgrade to your M4-22. The M-LOK design allows mounting of bipods, grips, lights, lasers and optics.

Free float handguards are known to improve accuracy. The increased accuracy gained by using a free-floating handguard is due to the fact that the handguard doesn’t touch the barrel, it is mounted directly to the upper receiver, allowing the barrel to “float” and giving better harmonics and resulting in slightly increased accuracy.

The accuracy difference when using a free floating handguard is especially evident when using grips or bipods. When you rest a rifle on a bipod that is attached to the barrel, or a drop-in handguard, the bipod will create force that can slightly warp the barrel. This small amount of warping can provide fairly significant accuracy issues on the range. With a free-float handguard, you can put all kinds of force on the handguard and it won't affect the barrel whatsoever.

 

Tippmann Arms 9" M-LOK Handguard Features:

M-LOK
Aluminum construction
Comes with Barrel Nut
Anodized Black Finish
Increased Accuracy
Full Length Picatinny Rail
Weighs only 7.1oz

node.name: Tippmann Arms Ambi Safety Selector
node.short_description: The Tippmann Arms M4-22 Ambidextrous Selector Switch is constructed from durable steel and features a standard 90-degree throw.
node.description:
The Tippmann Arms M4-22 Ambidextrous Selector Switch is constructed from durable steel and features a standard 90-degree throw.

This selector will only fit the Tippmann Arms M4-22 rifles and pistols.

 

Tippmann Arms Ambi Safety Selector Features:

Easy Installation
Right & Left Levers

node.name: Tippmann Arms Extended Charging Handle
node.short_description: Tippmann Arms Extended Charging handle for the M4-22 makes charging much easier when a scope is installed.
node.description:
Tippmann Arms Extended Charging Handle for the M4-22. Makes charging your M4-22 much easier when a scope is installed.

Oversized latch for quick access from all shooting positions. Allows quick and easy operation with left hand. Makes the charging handle easier to find and operate, especially on scope-mounted flat top receivers.

Great for three gun shooters, speeds up reloads and immediate action drills. Works only on the M4-22. Easy installation with no gunsmithing required.
